com.smartnsoft.droid4me.ws

Class WebServiceCaller.SensibleHttpClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.http.impl.client.AbstractHttpClient
      • org.apache.http.impl.client.DefaultHttpClient
        • com.smartnsoft.droid4me.ws.WebServiceCaller.SensibleHttpClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.http.client.HttpClient
    Enclosing class:
    WebServiceCaller

    protected static class WebServiceCaller.SensibleHttpClient
extends org.apache.http.impl.client.DefaultHttpClient
    Overrides the default DefaultHttpClient by disabling the cookies storing.

    The code is inspired from http://code.google.com/p/zxing/source/browse/trunk/android/src/com/google/zxing/client/android/AndroidHttpClient.java.

    Since:
    2011.09.16
